column4: Hi everyone.  I have a strange networking issue.  I've configured my ethernet using ifconfig.  I can ping my other computers on the network, and I can ping my router/modem.  But, I can't ping anything outside of the local network.  Neither by IP address or www name.  However, I can do an nslookup and get IP addresses.
are your local machines using your router for dns proxy?
are your local machines getting addresses via dhcp?
Where do I find the conf files that I have to set my gateway and dns up in (I think it's just default.conf, but I can't remember for sure)?  Thanks.
